title: Grading 30-plus NBA deals, including Damian Lillard's Portland reunion
description: Kevin Pelton breaks down the most impactful signings, including the Blazers bringing back franchise icon Damian Lillard.
author: Kevin Pelton

title: 'We couldn't chance it': Why the Suns and Bradley Beal finally came to terms
description: One element of the Suns' roster failure has loomed: How to end their marriage to the three-time All-Star.
author: Brian Windhorst

title: McIlroy three back as Fitzpatrick shares Open lead
description: Rory McIlroy delights and frustrates in equal measure as Matt Fitzpatrick ends day one of the 153rd Open Championship in a five-way tie for the lead.

title: How the 'greatest and worst shootout of all time' unfolded
description: One goalkeeper saved four penalties, the other kept out two and three players missed the target - how England came out on top of a rollercoaster shootout.

title: 2 Sacramento Kings Legends Land on All-Time NBA Greats List
description: The Sacramento Kings had two legends make the list of the top 100 players in NBA history.

title: Caitlin Clark Fan Thrown Out Of Fever-Sun Game
description: A fan wearing a Caitlin Clark Indiana Fever jersey had to be escorted out of TD Garden on Tuesday night.

title: Archer: Lord's win made injury rehab 'all worth it'
description: Jofra Archer says being part of a thrilling England win over India in his comeback game at Lord's made his long journey back to Test cricket "all worth it."

title: The Open notebook: McIlroy's major prep, Rahm's photobombing and more!
description: Sky Sports News' Jamie Weir pick out six storylines from the practice days ahead of The Open, including Rory McIlroy's prep for a home major win, Jon Rahm surprising fans in a Portrush bar and the players already making headlines at Royal Portrush...
